channel.title: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?
channel.description:
Okay.. I got my own server. THERE IS ALL WHAT I HAVE BEEN USED 1st. I download server beta 2nd. I download 508 ip changer 3rd. I change run.bat and compile and everything else to my java version. I GOT JDK1.6.0_13 4th. I run my run.bat and and it says something: Starting server on port: 43594 5th. I go on server on my hamachi IP: 5.169.157.112 I get in. Okay here comes the problem: Now when i go to mine other computer and try to join my server with 508 ip changer It only say: CONNECTION TO UPDATE SERVER
HOW I FIX THIS PROBLEM!! I WANNA SO MY OWN SERVER THX IF YOU HELP ME IS IT BOSSIBLE TO IT DOSN´T CONNECT COZ I USE SAME NETWORK?

item.title: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?
item.dc:creator: @ironforg2 ironforg2
item.description:
@ironforg2 wrote:

make sure your other computer is connected to hamachi and uses the same hamachi ip.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?

item.title: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

even though this is a double post i thinki can help

ok first for hamachi, you dont need a client

lets say comp1 is ur computer running the server
and comp2 is ur other computer trying to connect to it
ok, so comp2 needs to connect to your comp1 via hamachi
then using comp2 find the files needed for the client on comp1
ie used comp2 and search comp1 for the client files once connected
then using comp2 start the client, and when it asks for the ip i think you can just put 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1
or your no-ip(thats best)
there all done

hamachi is too much trouble for anyone, thats why hardly anyone uses it, its only good if you dont want to download clients often

Read full topic
item.source: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?

item.title: Why can´t join at OTHER computer?
item.dc:creator: @Coca-Cola-Zero Coca-Cola-Zero
item.description:
@Coca-Cola-Zero wrote:

Okay… I got my own server.
THERE IS ALL WHAT I HAVE BEEN USED
1st. I download server beta
2nd. I download 508 ip changer
3rd. I change run.bat and compile and everything else to my java version. I GOT JDK1.6.0_13
4th. I run my run.bat and and it says something: Starting server on port: 43594
5th. I go on server on my hamachi IP: 5.169.157.112 I get in.
Okay here comes the problem: Now when i go to mine other computer and try to join my server with 508 ip changer It only say: CONNECTION TO UPDATE SERVER

HOW I FIX THIS PROBLEM!! I WANNA SO MY OWN SERVER THX IF YOU HELP ME
IS IT BOSSIBLE TO IT DOSN´T CONNECT COZ I USE SAME NETWORK?

Read full topic
